name: Otrack.io
description:
• Developed modules for native mobile application for IOS and android in nativescript and Angular for grocery apps
• Developed and released mobile applications for 4 stores using Otrack’s template software on Android and IOS to launch online storefronts for the clients
• Redesigned UI for application views using Angular and Sass to improve navigational and display components and enhance the user experience

name: Canadian Institute for Health Information
description:
• Developed a comparison report service with web UI in Java for program area to highlight and list discrepancies and changes made upon data loading that drastically improved the quality assurance of the data in the database
• Migrated Canadian MIS database (CMDB) legacy application from Struts to Spring Boot and MVC framework; redeveloping java backend controllers, frontend xml configurations and JSP pages with EL and JSTL to improve application performance, software support and update the app to a modern technology stack
• Designed solutions to resolve software design and program deficiencies/problems relating to  validation, message resources, CIHI authentication services and Spring security to resolve migration issues and improve code design and performance
• Redeveloped automated testing using Junit and Mockito for the CMDB web app after migration for build time and release testing

name: Carleton Computer Science
description: • TA for fundamentals of web applications in fall 2020 and intro to systems engineering in winter 2021

name: ITREB Canada - Virtual Learning Center
description:
• Developed and administered an LTI K-12 learning platform for ITREB Canada using Moodle to host integrated programming for 5000 students across the country
• Developed customized report services using MySQL and Python to compile user statistics, track progress and generate activity reports
